document.full_text: japan's return to recession and a bigger-than-expected slump in first-quarter economic growth are negative for its credit rating, moody's investors service said, warning that a delay in recovery could warrant additional fiscal and monetary stimulus.
document.title: moody's warns japan recession is negative for rating
lines_and_colors: japan's return to recession and a bigger-than-expected slump in first-quarter economic growth are negative for its credit rating, moody's investors service said, warning that a delay in recovery could warrant additional fiscal and monetary stimulus.
